name: Ian Howells
title: Co-Founder Traffic Think Tank
body: Working with Joey is always smooth. Really impressive front-end chops too.

name: Jon Henshaw
title: Sr. Director, Technical SEO - Vimeo
body: Joey is incredible at what he does. Dependable, competent, and fun to work with.

name: Christian Thurston
title: COO SearchEye
body: Joey’s work quality is great –and I’ve always found him easy to work with. Highly recommend.

name: Arvin Dang
title: Sr. Product Designer - Table XI
body: I trust Joey with my clients, my work, and I very much look forward to future opportunities together.

name: Devon Hennig
title: VP of Marketing - Docebo
body: The only dev you want working on your web project. Extremely responsive, professional, 110% recommend.

name: Loyld Silver
title: Founder & CEO - ContentRamp
body: I've wasted so much time looking for a great developer. I'm now done looking. He's an absolute pleasure to work with.
